oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Grocers and clerks go to school at night, from the Nashville Times, 1940
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A captioned photo from the Nashville Times (1940), about night classes at Jennings Grocery. The caption reads: “The above group of Nashville grocers and grocery clerks were photographed as they attended evening classes at Jennings Grocery at 913 Buchanan Street. The classes, organized to increase efficiency and render greater service to consumers, are conducted in North Nashville for retail grocers and clerks on Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday and Thursday nights under the supervision of the state department of education, division of vocational education.” Forms part of the Nashville Times newspaper collection. 1 digital photo.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Jennings Grocery (Nashville, Tenn.)
